data.lines: Registration is not available on site. Administrator can add a user-realtor via administrator's panel.
Posting listings of the type "Looking to buy" is not available.
Posting listing of the type 'Looking to rent' is not available.
Posting listing for sale is not available..
Posting listing of the type 'Looking to lease' is not available..
Option 'Show interest in the listing' is not available.
Section "My messages" is not available. While viewing the listing a user can send an email to listing owner's private email (E-mail will be hidden and not displayed in forms).
Cooperation offer for realtors will be hidden (a special form for contacting administrator).
Option of complaining on a member is disabled.
Section 'Matching my criteria' is not available.
Search for online members will be hidden.
Search for new members will be hidden.
Search for most active members will be hidden.
